mean_cn: n. 原因，理由，理智，理性；  v. 理论，论证，推理，劝说
mean_en: a statement or fact that explains why something is the way it is, why someone does, thinks, or says something, or why someone behaves a certain way
sentence: What was the reason his girlfriend didn't love him any more?
sentence_trans: 他女朋友不再爱他的理由是什么？
